Two approaches to education:  
Path 1: Clear all obstacles, carry them to success  
Result: Dependent learners who fear challenges  
Path 2: Guide them as they overcome obstacles  
Result: Confident problem-solvers who embrace growth  
Open education chooses Path 2.  
Which path is your child's education on?
